name:
Phonics Fun with Biff,
Chip & Kipper vol. 3: Update
formal_name:
Phonics Fun with Biff,
Chip & Kipper vol. 3: Update
description:
An update for Phonics Fun with Biff, Chip & Kipper vol. 3 is now available from Nintendo eShop.

All customers who own a copy of “Phonics Fun with Biff, Chip & Kipper vol. 3” should download the update.

This will update the software to Version 1.1 with the following amendments:

- Various bugs have been fixed in order to provide a smoother gaming experience.
